articles.description: A Near-Earth Object (NEO), the asteroid is called 163348 (2002 NN4) and is classified as a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid (PHA).
articles.content: This asteroid is classified as a PHA, which means the asteroid has the potential to make threatening close approaches to the Earth. (Representational Image)Earlier this week, NASA announced that a gi… [+3395 chars]

articles.title: Astronomers may have found an Earth-like exoplanet orbiting a sun-like star - News-Daily.com
articles.description: Some 3,000 light years away from Earth, researchers believe they have found an Earth-size exoplanet orbiting a sun-like star.
articles.content:
Some 3,000 light years away from Earth, researchers believe they have found an Earth-size exoplanet orbiting a sun-like star.
